definition: producer (of goods, commodities or farm produce etc)/manufacturer/(biology) autotroph
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: He produced bulldogs that was great producers and match dogs.
sentences.chinese: 他制作的牛头犬队的比赛是伟大的生产者和狗。

sentences.english: Similarly, producers are not aware of where their published messages are sent.
sentences.chinese: 同样，生产者也不会知道他们发布的消息被发往何处。

sentences.english: The Producer-Consumer rule can be enforced at the server level.
sentences.chinese: 在服务层实施的是生产者消费者规则。

sentences.english: They shall not involve direct payments to producers or processors.
sentences.chinese: 它们不得涉及对生产者或加工者的直接支付。

sentences.english: Mukesh Bhatt and Yash Chopra from the producers' side.
sentences.chinese: 穆凯什布哈特和亚什乔普拉从生产者的一方。

sentences.english: On the assertion of producer, gluing they are resistant to abrasion and action of water.
sentences.chinese: 就断言生产者，胶合他们是抗磨损和行动的水。

sentences.english: Agricultural producers are influenced by global demand and by weather-driven supply.
sentences.chinese: 农产品生产者受全球需求和天气状况的双重影响。

sentences.english: Some of the producers were even considering starting to study Syrah and other varieties.
sentences.chinese: 有些生产者甚至在考虑开始研究席拉和其它品种。

sentences.english: The producer and the consumer are distinct roles with different knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 生产者和消费者是具有不同知识的不同角色。

sentences.english: The producers of oil and other nonperishable commodities have an advantage.
sentences.chinese: 产石油和其他不易坏物品的生产者有其优势。

sentences.english: The first is from a producer of a leading current-events TV show.
sentences.chinese: 第一个来自现场直播的电视节目生产者。

sentences.english: The amount of indirect tax is paid by the producers to the government.
sentences.chinese: 间接税的款项是由生产者支付给政府。

sentences.english: However it plays out, Martinez, the producer's association president, is not complaining.
sentences.chinese: 不管如何，生产者协会董事长马提来兹都不会抱怨。

sentences.english: Japan Animation Industry Trend. Jetro Japan Economic Monthly, June 2005.
Both information producers and consumers are anonymous.
sentences.chinese: 信息生产者和消费者都是匿名的。

definition: to produce/to manufacture/to give birth to a child
